oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A glimpse of the battlefield Chickamauga, Chattanooga, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted photograph of the Chickamauga Battlefield. There are numerous trees in the foreground and a few cannons are visible in the distance. Features a white border and divided back. Postcard made in the United States of America. [No. A-35741]
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park (Ga. And Tenn.); Chickamauga Battlefield (Ga.); Walker County (Ga.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: National parks & reserves; Battlefields; Trees; Cannons
